major: Inline horizontal form layouts (label: value style)
Professional tool aesthetic with technical feel
minor: Panels: Light gray theme (#fafafa bg, #d4d4d4 borders)
Form groups: Inline flex layout with 70px label column
Buttons: Flat design with 28-32px height, no rounded corners
Color picker: Inline swatch layout with blue active state
Signature library: Redesigned with Tweakpane aesthetic
patches: CRITICAL: Fixed signature panel crash (null pdfCanvas check)
Fixed signatures not loading when reopening panel
Added rotation progress notifications (rotating, reloading, thumbnails)
Fixed signature library CSS variables (replaced with actual colors)
Added DB initialization check before loading signatures
Improved signature item styling (40px height, 60px width)
Enhanced debug logging for signature operations
